title:
BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel W/ Cover, 4.2 ft. x 4 ft. x 4.4 ft, indoors and outdoors,  galvanized metal iron thick wire tube fences, rust-resistance, no sharp edges, waterproof cover,
protect dog from the hot sun,  small and large size available, also for: chicken, rabbit, duck.
descriptions:
Give your pet room to roam with the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover—built for comfort, safety, and all‑weather protection.

Why you’ll love it:
- Sturdy, rust-resistant build: Crafted from galvanized metal iron with a durable paint-coated finish, the thick welded wire panels stand up to daily use indoors or outdoors. No sharp edges for safer play.
- Weather-ready cover: The included 210D Oxford cloth roof is waterproof, windproof, and weatherproof, providing reliable sun shade to help protect your pet from heat and UV.
- Secure and convenient: A solid latching swing gate with strong latches keeps pets safely contained while offering easy access for you.
- Breezy comfort: Open wire design promotes excellent airflow and visibility so pets stay comfortable and you can keep an eye on them.
- Flexible sizing: Available in small and large to fit your space and your pet’s needs. The 4.2 ft W x 4 ft L x 4.4 ft H footprint is perfect for compact yards, patios, or indoor areas.
- Versatile enclosure: Ideal for dogs and equally useful for chickens, rabbits, and ducks—great for multi-pet households or backyard hobbyists.
- Easy assembly: Simple panel design makes setup quick and hassle-free.

Give your companion a secure, shaded, and spacious spot to relax and play. Choose BingoPaw for durability, protection, and peace of mind—season after season.
